review: It worked great for the first month I had it but now whenever I try and watch something it constantly freezes like there is not enough bandwidth to stream the movie.  I have no problems with any other devices streaming.  I use an Apple TV, a playstation, computer, iPad, and all those things stream content beautifully and at the same time if I want.  The wireless router is in the same room as my fire tv stick.  I have tried to reset multiple times to no avail.  Glad I only paid $19 for it, went back to streaming from my playstation.
author: Adam Ready

review: I bought this after already owning a Chromecast. Amazon suckered me in with the prime member discount and early purchase and I am glad they did. This is very similar to Chromecast with slightly different features. I like having a normal remote with this but also use the free app on the phone for voice control. If I had a Fire Tablet, I'm sure I could have the full effect. Streaming is pretty fast with this as well. If you have been on the fence, give this a shot!
author: Matt

review: Love it.  Added the Plex app for $5 and can now view my local copies of movies, pictures, and music from my home NAS anywhere using my Firestick.  Also can view movies just using Plex with anything with a web browser.  We do Netflix, Amazon Prime videos, Amazon Music, all my local media too with the FireStick.  Very cool.
